titles.title: Respect for Peace Corps Volunteers Act of 2013
To amend the Peace Corps Act to allow former volunteers to use the seal, emblem, or name of Peace Corps on death announcements and grave stones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 4/15/2013--Introduced. Respect for Peace Corps Volunteers Act of 2013 - Amends the Peace Corps Act to allow former volunteers or applicants for enrollment as a volunteer to use the seal, emblem, or name "Peace Corps" on death announcements, plaques, grave stones, or other grave markers.
